content: ★ granny square rectangle mug cozy crochet pattern ★ one-size ★ skill level easy ★ language english / us crochet terms crochet mug cozy pattern ------------------------ the crochet mug cozy is a great granny square pattern worked in rounds from the center outwards this scrap yarn crochet pattern https //joyofmotioncrochet com/scrap-yarn-crochet-patterns/ is the perfect way to use up your yarn stash combine your tree favorite yarn colors & decorate your coffee mugs with crochet ##### pattern contains ☆ gauge ☆ pictures ☆ sizing & measurements inches & metric ☆ instructions ☆ & a bunch more details ##### you will need #### crochet hook siz e 5 5 mm / us i 9 / uk 5 https //joyofmotioncrochet com/tag/5-5-mm-crochet-hook/ hook i used symphonie rose crochet hooks from knitpro https //joyofmotioncrochet com/symphonierosecrochethooks #### yarn ##### **yarn used ** hobbii friends cotton 8/8 https //hobbii com/friends-cotton-8-8 option=21097 in color pastel yellow 21 ca turquise 94 cb and pink berry smoothie 54 cc learn how to substitute yarn https //joyofmotioncrochet com/substitute-yarn-for-crochet-patterns/ ##### **how much yarn needed for the crochet mug cozy ** <1 skeins of each color ##### **yarn characteristics ** 3 light yarn https //joyofmotioncrochet com/tag/3-light-yarn/ dk yarn 100 % cotton #### other materials needed needle find one here https //joyofmotioncrochet com/hemlinemetalyarnneedles scissors https //amzn to/2twlcik tape measure https //www amazon com/s k=tape+measure+yarn&crid=12ypnw2e8xhj5&sprefix=tape+measure+yarn%2caps%2c136&linkcode=ll2&tag=joyofmot-20&linkid=27efc07ccd9017321880138a5c32707d&language=en_us&ref_=as_li_ss_tl ##### more ☆ visit my shop joy of motion https //shop joyofmotioncrochet com/ ☆ visit my blog blog https //joyofmotioncrochet com/blog/ keep yourself updated on joy of motion through ☆ newsletters keep me updated https //joyofmotioncrochet com/newsletter/ ☆ instagram @joyofmotion http //instagram com/joyofmotion ☆ joy of motion crochet facebook page https //www facebook com/joyofmotioncrochet ☆ pinterest http //www pinterest com/joyofmotion/ this crochet pattern is designed by me janne owner of joy of motion i design crochet patterns & share them with the world by selling them online i designed my first crochet pattern in 2011 & now i m hooked finally all my crochet patterns are made from my own ideas & inspiration as a result of my creativity i really love trying something new all my crochet patterns can be used to produce & sell handmade however you are required to let joy of motion know & credit joy of motion as the designer finally you can not resell the pattern as your own
